prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon with bright orange spots and flowing fins.
I want a swimming Pokemon that has a sleek body and distinctive horns.
Generate a Pokemon that has a vibrant color palette of orange and white.
Make a fish-like Pokemon that excels in both speed and agility in water.
Imagine a Pokemon with unique features like a pronounced horn and long fins.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in aquatic environments with eye-catching colors.
Show me a Pokemon that is known for its playful personality and bold appearance.
